00017 enum EHistogram1DIntType {kHistogram1DNBins, kHistogram1DId, kNHistogram1DInts};
00018 enum EHistogram1DFloatType {kHistogram1DXmin, kHistogram1DXmax, kNHistogram1DFloats};
00019 enum EHistogram1DDoubleType {kHistogram1DEntries, kNHistogram1DDoubles};
00020 
00027 class Histogram1D : public lcio::LCGenericObject
00028 {
00029 protected:
00030   Histogram1D(lcio::LCObject* a_obj);
00031   Histogram1D() : _obj(0) , _createdObject( false) {};
00032 
00033 public:
00034   ~Histogram1D() { 
00035       if( _createdObject )  delete _obj ; 
00036   }
00037 
00039   //CRP 5/1/06 To satisfy redefinition of interface in LCIO
00040   virtual int id() const { return _obj->id() ; }
00041 
00044   UInt_t firstBinIndex() const {return 1;};
00045 
00048   UInt_t lastBinIndex() const {return nBins();};
00049 
00052   UInt_t underflowBinIndex() const {return 0;};
00053 
00056   UInt_t overflowBinIndex() const {return nBins()+1;};
00057   
00060   UInt_t nBins() const {
00061     return (UInt_t)  _obj->getIntVal(kHistogram1DNBins);
00062   };
00063 
00066   Float_t xMin() const {
00067     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram1DXmin);
00068   }; 
00069 
00072   Float_t xMax() const {
00073     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram1DXmax);
00074   };
00075 
00078   Float_t binCenter(UInt_t bin_index) const
00079   {
00080     Float_t x=xMin() + (xMax()-xMin()) * (bin_index-firstBinIndex()+.5) / nBins();
00081     return x;
00082   }
00083 
00084   /* Return the axis value of the low edge of the given bin.
00085    */
00086   Float_t binLowEdge(UInt_t bin_index) const
00087   {
00088     Float_t x=xMin();
00089     Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00090     x+=x_step*(bin_index-firstBinIndex());
00091     return x;
00092   }
00093 
00096   Float_t binWidth(UInt_t) const
00097   {
00098     Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00099     return x_step;
00100   }
00101 
00104   //CRP 5/1/06 To satisfy redefinition of interface in LCIO
00105   UInt_t calice_id() {
00106     return (UInt_t) _obj->getIntVal(kHistogram1DId);
00107   }
00108 
00111   Double_t entries() const {
00112     return _obj->getDoubleVal(kHistogram1DEntries);
00113   };
00114 
00115 protected:
00120   void addToEntries(Double_t weight)  {
00121     _obj->setDoubleVal(kHistogram1DEntries,entries()+weight);
00122   };
00123 
00124 
00125   // ---- need to implement LCGenericObject interface:
00126     
00127   int getNInt() const    { return kNHistogram1DInts ; };
00128   int getNFloat() const  { return _obj->getNFloat() ; };
00129   int getNDouble() const { return _obj->getNDouble(); }; 
00130     
00131   int getIntVal(int index) const {
00132     return _obj->getIntVal( index ) ;
00133   };
00134   float getFloatVal(int index) const { 
00135     return _obj->getFloatVal( index ) ;
00136   };
00137   double getDoubleVal(int index) const {
00138     return  _obj->getDoubleVal( index ) ;
00139   };
00140   bool isFixedSize() const { return false ; };
00141 
00142   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00143     return __typeName;
00144   }
00145 
00146   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00147     return __description;
00148   }
00149   
00150   // ---- end of LCGenericObject interface
00151 
00152 protected:
00153 
00156   void setBinning(const HistPar &bins) {
00157     _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram1DNBins,(Int_t) bins.nBins());
00158     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram1DXmin,bins.xMin());
00159     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram1DXmax,bins.xMax());
00160   };
00161 
00164   UInt_t binIndex(Float_t value) const 
00165   {
00166     Float_t x_min=xMin();
00167     Float_t x_max=xMax();
00168     UInt_t n_bins=nBins();
00169 
00170     if (value>=x_max) {return overflowBinIndex();};
00171     if (value<x_min) {return underflowBinIndex();};
00172     return (UInt_t) (((value-x_min)/(x_max-x_min))*n_bins)+firstBinIndex();
00173   };
00174 
00175   lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() {return _obj;};
00176   const lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() const {return _obj;};
00177 
00178   lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* _obj;
00179   bool _createdObject ;
00180   static const std::string __typeName;
00181   static const std::string __description;
00182 };
00183 
00184 }
00185 #endif
